nodes.text: Tin was a non-rusting metal that could be melted into a liquid form.

Ahsoka Tano called battle droids "tin-plated. Han Solo compared its taste to blood after the Millennium Falcon crash-landed on Kessel. C-3PO called R2-D2 a pile of tin, and Lando Calrissian subsequently called C-3PO "tin man".
